Summary: Bright light seen at night not moving, but pulsati
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around July 12th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile swinging my toddler son in the front driveway to help him fall asleep, hebegan to point into the sky and mutter as he does whenever he sees an airplane Iam a student pilot and we look for airplanes every night together. I loked upto see a VERY bright light brighter than any star or MARS which is nearing itsclosest point and is the second brightest object after the moon. The lightfaded and grew brighter for about 20 seconds....it was almost directly above us,but we heard no sound at all and the light never moved...just pulsed....then itfaded within a few seconds and was gone.
